text: On May 19, 2022, a mass shooting happened in Chicago, Illinois, United States, in the city's Magnificent Mile shopping district. Two people were killed, and eight others were injured. One person has been arrested with the weapon used for the shooting being taken by Chicago police. The shooting took place outside of a McDonald's restaurant. It was caused after two groups of young people got into a fight. After the shooting, the suspect ran from the scene and caused a chase between police officials to a nearby Red Line train subway station. During the chase, woman fell onto the tracks and was electrocuted. A suspect was arrested by police on May 20, 2022. ==References== Category:2022 mass shootings in the United States Category:2022 murders in the United States Category:2020s in Chicago Category:Crime in Illinois Category:May 2022 events Category:Murders by firearm in the United States
title: Magnificent Mile shooting
